name: Follower: Hulda Shadowblade
description: Hulda Shadowblade dreaded her early life as a Dark Iron, living in what she considered cowardly conditions within the depths of Blackrock Mountain. The day Moira took one of the seats of power on the Council of Three Hammers, Hulda called Ironforge her new home, vowing to fulfill any desire her  Queen-Regent had with her blades.
